entry.data:
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST THIS AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S

LOWS IN THE MID 70S
